1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Agha Jaan, is a landlord in Kohat. His Son Behroze and niece Arjumand were engaged in their childhood on Agha Jan's decision. Behroze reaches home and reveals to his dad and brother Suhaib that he loves Ruhina his classmate not Arjumand.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: After Disputes with Agha Jan and Arjumand's parents. Agha Jaan orders Behroze to leave the house. He also ask Suhaib to marry Arjumand, disturbing both. Behorze visits Ruhina, told her that he has left. Ruhi asks her brother for marriage.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Ruhi told her brother that she will only marry Behorze and believes him, reluctant to his reservations Tajamul agrees. Arjumand and Suhaib get married forcefully. Ruhi and Behroze too get married but with love. Suhaib and Laila bids adieu.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Behroze and Ruhi shifts to their new home, Arjumand and Suhaib are unhappy with their situation. Behroze dreams of Agha Jan and gets worried. He and Ruhi visits Haveli make amends, but Agha Jan, insults Ruhi and banishes both of them.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Suhaib and Arjumand are still resent to each other. Behroze gets a new job, Ruhi gets pregnant, she later suffers a miscarriage and blamed herself it thinking that this happened because they hurt Agha Jaan and her brother.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Arjumand gets pregnant, she hates her life and humiliates Suhaib. Behroze topped in his exams and got a high salary job. Arjumand later confess her feelings for Suhaib, she gives birth to Wali. Suhaib and Behroze remember their memories.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Behroze remembers Agha Jaan but lies to Ruhina not making her upset. Arjumand and Suhaib have decided to move on. One year passes, Ruhi gets pregnant and gives birth to Faarah, bringing joy. Suhaib visited her but is sent back by Behroze.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: After 20 years, Arjumand, Suhaib are living peacefully with their family, Ruhi and her brother are living adjacent to each other. Suhaib expresses his wish of the marriage of Faarah and Wali to Behroze which makes him furious.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Suhaib asked Agha Jaan to forgive Behroze and Ruhi Agha Jaan agrees. He also told him that he wants Wali to get married with Faarah. Later, an unknown incident leads to Suhaib death bringing grief. After 20 years Behroze went to Hawaili..

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Agha Jan's suffers heart attack. Behroze calls Ruhi and tell her about his stay, his phone's battery gets off making Ruhi suspicious over Behroze's family. Laila met Behroze, she reveals him about Suhaib sacrifices for him.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Ruhi believes that Behroze has changed. Behroze expresses his wish to Agha Jan for Faarah and Wali's marriage. Behroze convinces every one but Ruhi and asks her to come along with Faarah. Ruhi and Faarah have reached the haveli.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Faarah and Ruhina have reached the Haveli. Ruhi recalls what Agha Jan did to her 20 years back. Behroze shocks Ruhi by informing her about the marriage, she rejects it blaming Agha Jan, Behroze yells at her leaving her heartbroken.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Ruhi accused Agha Jan for using Behroze. She asks Faarah to refuse for her marriage but Faarah marries Wali. Behroze and his family return for Faarah's studies. Ruhi left her home living with Tajamul. Behroze and Ruhi are now in a fight.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Behroze tells her that he wants to go back with them. Ruhi and Behroze miss each other. Later, Faarah is shocked to find Behroze dead, Ruhi becomes unconscious.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: After Wali announces Behroze's wish for his burial next to Suhaib, Ruhi agrees with it. Ruhina curse and blamed everyone in Haveli on the funeral and leaves. After returning home she becomes falls ill, Moeez stays with her and helps her.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Agha Jaan along with Wali visits Ruhina to take them back to Haveli, upon which she gets furious, Agha Jaan leaves by saying that they will come again to take them back. Faarah's education and their household expenses.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Faarah gets furious upon Ruhi's decision for taking money from Agha Jaan and the two have a dispute. After making a joint account, Wali and Faarah have lunch where Wali expressed his true feelings.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Agha Jaan and Wali arrives with Lahore for Faarah's medical admission, together they have lunch and later Agha Jaan has a gift of a car for Faarah.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Faarah and Ruhi argue over the money. Agha Jan invited them for Behroze's death anniversary, as Faarah got sick, Agha jan visited her where Ruhi and Arjumand confront each other for their pasts. Arjumand shows no interest on divorce issue.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Ruhi accepted Moeez's proposal. Moeez proposes to Faarah on a restaurant where Wali saw and threatened them. Faarah accepts her divorce case in front of Agha Jan and Arjumand, but is revealed that her mother has also asked for property.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Faarah aggressively asks Ruhi why she asked for her property, both started arguing. Ruhi left her house to punish Faarah. Agha Jan gets a heart attack. Wali blamed Faarah and aggressively took her with him, both started fighting.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Wali took Faarah to their Farm house resort as his hostage. Faarah furiously signed Wali's contract which stated that she would live with them for three months due to Agha Jan's health, upon seeing Faarah Agha Jan's health improved.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Unaware of the contract, Arjumand accepts Faarah to stay while Zarminay distances from her, Ruhi informs Moeez about Faarah's condition, and came back to Lahore, Moeez calls Faarah telling her that he will take her back but Faraah refuses.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Faraah starts to improve her relation with Agha Jaan, she starts having dreams of her father explaining his mistakes, It is revealed that Moeez has asked Ruhina to start the property issue and had fooled them for his benefit.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Agha Jan's friend sent his grandson's proposal for Zarminay. Faraah refused to go with Moeez who held Ruhi responsible for the situation. Faraah came to know about Zarminay's proposal and thought why she was not asked for her own marriage.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Faraah admits her mistakes to Wali and improves her relationship with Zarminey. Moeez fails to manipulate Farah, as she gave Agha Jan more importance. Faraah destroys the contract which she signed with Wali and wants to stay with him.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Faraah admits her mistakes to Wali and improves her relationship with Zarminey. Moeez fails to manipulate Farah, who says that her Agha Jaan is more important to her than Moeez. Faraah destroys the contract she had signed with Wali.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Arjumand still thinks that Faraah hasn't changed. Moeez came to see Faarah, Faarah tells him that she wants to continue her relation with Wali. Later Faraah apologizes to Wali about her mistakes and asks him that she doesn't want divorce.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Faraah reveals to Agha Jaan that Ruhi had left her before coming to Haveli, when she refuse to take the property. Later, Ruhi gets to know that Moeez and Tajamul's truth, she decides to call Faarah upon which Moeez locked her in room.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Mooez fool Faarah and kidnapped her from the haveli. Ruhi calls Faarah to warn her about Moeez, but Wali picks up the phone and she tells him instead, together they found Faraah, Moeez and Wali have a fight. A shot was fired.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Ruhi Wali and Faarah reach the haveli, Ruhi apologizes to Agha Jaan for her mistakes, Arjumand tells Wali that she cannot bear to see Ruhi at the haveli. Tajamul confronts Moeez in jail and blames him for their troubles.

imdb.plot outline: The story revolves around Agha Jan and his two sons Behroze and Suhaib. Behroze is engaged to Agha Jan's niece Arjumand since childhood but he refuses to accept this relation and wants to marry Ruhina, who belongs to a middle-class family and is his class mate, when Agha Jan comes to know about this he tells him to either leave or marry Arjumand, Behroze leaves his father's house and Agha Jan announces that the wedding will take place as scheduled with his younger son Suhaib (who loves Laila). Arjumand denies to marry Suhaib as she treats him as her brother, however after Agha Jan pressures her she agrees. Both get married reluctantly, and Behroze marries Ruhina. Later Ruhina gives Birth to Faarah and Anjumand gives Birth to Wali and Zarmeena. Wali's Birth bring Arjumand and Suhaib close and eventually both fall in love. However after Suhaib's death (after 20 years) Behroze visits the Mansion and decides to fulfills his brothers last wish which was the marriage of their children. Ruhina opposes to this as she was insulted by Agha Jan and thrown out. The Series then focuses upon the relationships that occur in lives of many people
imdb.title: Diyar-e-Dil
plot: Story revolves around on the splinted family issue with separated parents. The story concludes a moral lessons regarding respect, love and care in relationships.::Saim Noon

Behroze is engaged to Agha Jan's niece Arjumand since childhood but he refuses to accept this relation and wants to marry Ruhina, who belongs to a middle-class family and is his class mate, when Agha Jan comes to know about this he tells him to either leave or marry Arjumand, Behroze leaves his father's house and Agha Jan announces that the wedding will take place as scheduled with his younger son Suhaib (who loves Laila). Arjumand denies to marry Suhaib as she treats him as her brother, however after Agha Jan pressures her she agrees. Both get married reluctantly, and Behroze marries Ruhina. Later Ruhina gives Birth to Faarah and Anjumand gives Birth to Wali and Zarmeena. Wali's Birth bring Arjumand and Suhaib close and eventually both fall in love. However after Suhaib's death (after 20 years) Behroze visits the Mansion and decides to fulfills his brothers last wish which was the marriage of their children. Ruhina opposes to this as she was insulted by Agha Jan and thrown out. The Series then focuses upon the relationships that occur in lives of many people::Saim Noon
synopsis: The story revolves around Agha Jan and his two sons Behroze and Suhaib. Behroze is engaged to Agha Jan's niece Arjumand since childhood but he refuses to accept this relation and wants to marry Ruhina, who belongs to a middle-class family. Stuck to the decision Behroze leaves his father's house and Agha Jan announces that the wedding will take place as scheduled with his younger son Suhaib (who likes Laila). Arjumand denies to marry Suhaib however, after Agha Jan pressurises her she agrees. Both get married reluctantly, and Behroze marries Ruhina. Later Ruhi gives birth to Faarah and Anjumand gives birth to Wali and Zarmeena. Wali's Birth brings Arjumand and Suhaib close and eventually both fall in love.Twenty years have passed and Faarah and Wali have grown up. After Suhaib pleads Behroze to return for his brotherly love, and finally convinces Agha Jan to phone him, an accident leads to his death, which puts Behroze in a very emotional state he and his family reach the Haveli to meet Agha Jan who is now a much kinder person. Ruhi who had been previously insulted by Agha Jan and thrown out from Haveli twenty years ago has changed her views about him and have started to hate him because of his behaviour. Behroze pressurises Ruhi to agree for Farah's marriage with Wali, since it was his brother's heart felt wish. Wali and Farah both get married and they barely know each other, seeing this a heartbroken Ruhi leaves the Haveli and starts living with her brother Tajamul again. Behroze meets an accident due to the Ruhi's umbrage and his brother death, this make Ruhi more aggressive and her hatred towards Agha Jaan grows. Farah never accepts her relation with Wali and wants to end it. She is interested in her maternal cousin Moeez who also happens to be her best friend. The dispute gets longer on the divorce and property issue, which makes Agha Jan fatally ill, who is a changed man now and wants Rohi and Farah to be a part of his life.Looking at Agha Jaan's health, Wali made an agreement with Faarah, that if she is ready to spend three months with Agha Jaan, he will divorce her. In between she gets to know that everything has changed and Agha Jaan is not the same person as he used to be. She makes amends for her misbehavior and falls in love with Wali, who first thinks that she is doing because she doesn't want to hurt Agha Jan. Faarah then tells Ruhi about her being wrong and tells her that Agha Jan is not the man he used to be, she further more tells her that Agha Jan needs their love and has health issues, listening to this Ruhi understands her mistake and rushes back to the Haveli, she apologises to Agha Jan who hugs and forgives her. After the end of agreement of Farah and Wali, Wali realises Faarah's love was true all the time and is now aware that she never lied for it even for Agha Jan he then forgives her and both reunite, Ruhi fullfils Behroze's presence and the entire family is united.
